description: '''Amalie Bruun''' (born 6 January 1985) is a Danish musician, actress and model. She currently fronts the one-person black metal project [[Myrkur]], where she acts as songwriter and multi-instrumentalist. Bruun has released four studio albums, one live album and two EPs with Myrkur, and one studio album and three EPs as a solo artist. She is the former lead singer of the indie pop band Ex Cops, which was active from 2011 to 2014.
